mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(title, contents, writer) values(#{title}, #{contents}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select idx,title,count, contents,writer,DATE_FORMAT(indate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS indate from tbl_board where idx= #{idx}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title=#{title}, contents =#{contents} where idx =#{idx}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_user where user_id= #{user_id} and password= #{password}
